name: Special Education Studies and Evaluations
objective: To assess progress in implementing the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act, including State and local efforts to provide (1) Free appropriate public education to children with disabilities; and (2) early intervention services to infants and toddlers with disabilities who would be at risk of having substantial developmental delays if early intervention services were not provided.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
